catchphrase: Join us for the original HalfStack event this November in London!
description: 200 Front-end / Web / JavaScript / Mobile / IoT developers and decision makers
Mostly from the greater London area and the UK
faqs: Does HalfStack London have last minute tickets available?
Not always. We love our venue but we're constrained by its size. Get your ticket early to save and avoid disappointment!
schedule: HalfStack starts around 10am, includes approximately 10 sessions, breaks, lunch, dinner, and the JS Pub Quiz afterparty. Plan to arrive between 9:00-9:45am and stay late!

description: Javascript is extremely versatile. We use it to build front-end, back-end, desktop, and mobile apps. But did you know you can even create music with it?!

Rowdy will show you how easy and fun it is to code your own music with the Web Audio API. As a bonus, he will throw in the Web MIDI API and Web Bluetooth API to really get the party started. Letâ€™s turn up the bass!
sessions.title: Beats in the Browser

description: Inspired by the game Plants vs. Zombies, Ramona will help us create a secure environment for your web application through test automation.
sessions.title: Plants vs Thieves

description: Machine learning models are interpreting the world and generative AI is taking over more and more of our tasks. What if we could use all this magic directly on our devices?
With WebAssembly and WebGPU, we have the tools to make all this possible. It's time to get ready for some unexpected examples of how to use AI in the browser!
sessions.title: From ML to LLM: on-device AI in the browser
